column2: "I know I have no right to ask you, but please! I need your help!"
"W-wait! Hold on a sec! Bowing your head like that is awkward!"
"Uhm... look, it's fine to raise your head. Look, everyone's staring at us..."
"Aah... Senpai! W-wait up, help me out here!"
"Senpai...? Oh! Hello!"
"Ah, so Io's Senpai is you! I see!"
"Oh, Senpai showed up! I'm saved... So this kid asked for a favor, then suddenly started bowing..."
"Bow? Why?"
"So what is she asking?"
"When asking a person who is over you, I learned this is what you should do!"
"I'm asking for her cooperation! It's something only Io can do!"
"I talked to Katori! She said working with Io in advertising the class was indispensable!"
"That's a misunderstanding by Katori! I didn't do anything!"
"That's not true! I heard about it! People talking about how you two were advertising!"
"W-Wait... you heard..."
"So I investigated and found Io once did this with Azanami too! It helped establish Bravers!"
"AAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!"
"And two information brokers also said Io was instrumental in this! I can only give you my thanks!"
"Stop it! Please, just stop!"
"So please Io! Don't be modest, for the sake of class consolidation! Please lend me your power!"
"I get it, I get it... If it's something I can do... Jeez..."
"Really!? Thank you so much, Io!"
"Then lets get started immediately! The most effective method is to advertise in a prominent area, is what Katori said!"
"E-Ehh!?"
"Thinking about it, people are gathering here! So Io, let's do it right here!"
"EEEHHH!?"
"A-ah Senpai! Ah, they've gotten mixed with the crowd! Please stop her!"
"We also have an exclusive outfit available! Do you want to wear it, Io?!"
"You're being too enthusiastic about this!"
